Award winners are chosen after a thorough assessment of the positive impact they have made not only on the overall business results but also on the effort put into marketing, enablement, and certification to provide tailored solutions for businesses with the Liferay platform.

value_i18n.ar_SA:
Liferay Partner Award winners were announced on February 6, 2024, at the gala dinner and award ceremony during Liferay's Sales Kickoff in Rome, Italy.

These awards recognize Liferay partners who have excelled at delivering powerful digital experience solutions on the Liferay platform for their clients to meet critical business needs, scale easily for growth, and future-proof for the challenges ahead.

Congratulations to our exceptional award winners!

Rising Stars of the Year
Honoring partners who joined the Liferay ecosystem in the past year and have demonstrated the greatest contributions to overall growth, with exceptional sales and marketing efforts, and outstanding client service within the regions.

  • AHT Tech - APAC
  • Kaar Technologies - EMEA
  • Yssy Soluções S.A. - LATAM
  • Nirvana Lab, Inc. - NA

Partners of the Year
Honoring partners with outstanding business results who expanded product adoption, delivered exceptional service, and grew their customer base within the regions.

  • AZing - APAC
  • USU - EMEA
  • Vass - LATAM
  • Carahsoft - NA

Industry Solution Partners of the Year
Honoring the partners who have shown success in industry problem-solving and expanding the digital experience footprint across the industry.

  • SMC - Manufacturing Industry
  • Campfire - Education Industry

Innovation Partner of the Year
Honoring the partner that developed new, innovative client solutions through new business model concepts, creating higher levels of growth and profitability, and implemented new go-to-market strategies.

  • Protiviti

value_i18n.ar_SA:
Category Summary

The Liferay Industry Solution Partner of the Year award recognizes partners who are dedicated to driving innovative solutions for specific industries and verticals, such as innovation in the banking industry. Winners of this award are partners who have shown success in industry problem solving and expanding the digital experience footprint across the industry.

Guidance and Recommendations

To be considered, nominations should show growth in end customer incremental annual recurring revenue (ARR) or contribution of Liferay net-new logos, include details of industries and departments where solutions apply; at least three referenceable customer examples; and customer impact measures such as cost savings, increased digital interaction, as well as other key success indicators of impact/ROI, i.e., cost savings and incremental revenues generated.

Award Criteria

  • Describe how has your solution created incremental value in a particular vertical market: either through the development of additional features/capabilities on top of the Liferay Platform or through unique services delivery capabilities that have led to significant impact in the market (net new logos, key wins, high ARR growth, new partnerships, etc.).
  • Submit your most valuable Vertical market achieved by the entry deadline. Please include the deal details: What vertical was your customer serving? What problem did your company solve for the the customer? Why was Liferay the right solution? What impact did your solution have on the customers business?
  • What other interesting and/or creative sources of industry innovation has your company built to expand business as well as Liferay adoption in the market?

Category Summary

The Liferay Innovation Partner of the Year award recognizes partners who exhibit true innovation in how they go to market. The nature of innovation is limitless! Winners of this award may have developed new business model concepts that created higher levels of growth and profitability, implemented successful strategies of going to market with 3rd parties, used inventive methods that delivered increased revenue and use of Liferay products and services. This can even include hyper-transformative innovation that redefined or disrupted markets or solved major socio-economic issues.

Guidance and Recommendations

To be considered, nominations must demonstrate how they have created significant impact in the market through net new logos, key wins, high incremental annual recurring revenue growth, new partnerships, etc. And/or they must demonstrate how they are redefining and disrupting business models, positively impacting humanity, or creating new business models that reach net new customers.

Award Criteria

  • Describe how your company has created incremental value: either through the development of additional features/capabilities on top of the Liferay Platform or through unique services/delivery capabilities that have led to significant impact in the market (net new logos, key wins, high ARR growth, new partnerships, etc.).
  •  Submit your most innovative win achieved by the entry deadline. Please include the deal details: What problem you solved for the the customer? Why Liferay was the right solution? What impact your solution had on the customer's business?
  • What other interesting and/or creative sources of innovation have you built to expand your business as well as Liferay adoption in the market?

The Liferay Innovation Partner of the Year award recognizes partners who exhibit true innovation in how they go to market. The nature of innovation is limitless! Winners of this award may have developed new business model concepts that created higher levels of growth and profitability, implemented successful strategies of going to market with 3rd parties, used inventive methods that delivered increased revenue and use of Liferay products and services. This can even include hyper-transformative innovation that redefined or disrupted markets or solved major socio-economic issues.

Guidance and Recommendations

To be considered, nominations must demonstrate how they have created significant impact in the market through net new logos, key wins, high incremental annual recurring revenue growth, new partnerships, etc. And/or they must demonstrate how they are redefining and disrupting business models, positively impacting humanity, or creating new business models that reach net new customers.

Award Criteria

  • Describe how your company has created incremental value: either through the development of additional features/capabilities on top of the Liferay Platform or through unique services/delivery capabilities that have led to significant impact in the market (net new logos, key wins, high ARR growth, new partnerships, etc.).
  •  Submit your most innovative win achieved by the entry deadline. Please include the deal details: What problem you solved for the the customer? Why Liferay was the right solution? What impact your solution had on the customer's business?
  • What other interesting and/or creative sources of innovation have you built to expand your business as well as Liferay adoption in the market?

value_i18n.ar_SA:
Category Summary

The Liferay Marketing Excellence Partner of the Year award recognizes partners  that effectively use marketing to drive demand for Liferay solution sales. The category winner is a partner who has demonstrates an integrated campaign with creative elements across channels, deep understanding of their target audience and needs, and clear goals with measurable results from execution of the marketing campaign and activities.

Guidance and Recommendations

To be considered, nominations must demonstrate marketing strategies that encompass the following details:

  • Marketing Strategy: A clear explanation of the overall marketing plan.
  • Demand Generation Tactics: Specific actions taken to generate interest.
  • Lead Qualification: The number of Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs) generated.
  • Lead Nurturing Activities: Actions taken to keep potential customers engaged.
  • Sales Performance: The number of closed/won business opportunities directly resulting from the campaign.
  • Success Factors: Specific reasons why this campaign was particularly effective.

Award Criteria

  • Describe the integrated marketing plan with defined goals and objectives and the specific tactics used to drive demand. Explain how strategy differed from past campaigns.
  •  How many leads did the campaign generate? How many leads where converted to Deal Registrations?
  • Please provide outcomes that demonstrate the campaign's overall success and the specific factors that contributed to this.
